data_table.description: The CKD Exam was conducted between 2007 and 2009. This dataset includes current use of medications affecting blood pressure, lipids, diabetes, and uric acid.

variable.name: MEDS_DIABETES
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: MEDS_HYT
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: MEDS_LIPIDS
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: MEDS_URICACID
variable.description: Taking Medication That Affect Uric Acid?
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class
